name: A Fishing Tale
description:
A Fishing Tale is a game created for the UE4 Summer Game Jam.

The theme is "Well, that escalated quickly".

In the game we follow a fishing tale. That can have a happy or unhappy ending.

The player controls a boat and need to cast the line to grab the fishes. Bigger fishes may appear for the players who progress in the game. A surprise await some players.

The game is played using the mouse and left button.

---- A game by Luccas Schmigel and Mateus de Quadros

Game Design and Programming: Mateus de Quadros
3D, 2D, Materials and Render: Luccas Schmigel
Music and Audio: Leonardo Lima

>> all assets created by the authors, except these premade assets: water Normal textures - from cadhatch.com and textures.com. Some audio effects - from Soundly. Hook, ship, water, fish and mouse icons - from iconarchive.com. Font "please write me a song" - from DaFont.com
